reviewText:
I'm Dutch myself and I took this movie with me to watch it with my fiancée and is American. Yes the region thing on this DVD is annoying and they should just end that system.

The best way to watch this movie is to snuggle up with your loved ones with hot choco and enough snacks to last the movie.
I love to use kruidnoten, which is a cinnamon spiced treat we eat around these days.

The title of this movie "Alles is liefde" means Everything is love
If you're Dutch or of Dutch descent you should see this movie.  It's a romantic comedy that takes place during Sinterklaas.
